Originally reported by: **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**

---

```
#!python

import abc

class MyInt(metaclass=abc.ABCMeta):
   pass

print(MyInt.register(int))
print(issubclass(int, MyInt)) # should return True
```
